NEW_GAME.EASY_HELP: In easy mode you will have some already completed letters that make the game very easy to complete!
NEW_GAME.NORMAL_HELP: In normal mode you will have some three letters hints that will help you only a little bit to complete the game!
NEW_GAME.DIFFICULT_HELP: In difficult mode you only will have the basics help, but you will figure out the message all by yourself
NEW_GAME.FREQUENT_LETTERS: Number of the most frequent letters to be autocompleted
NEW_GAME.RANDOM_LETTERS: Number of random words letter to be autocompleted
NEW_GAME.AUTOCOMPLETE_HINT_HELP: Automatically fill the letters in the code that are present in the hint
NEW_GAME.LETTERS_HINT: Number of letters of the word for the hint
NEW_GAME.LETTERS_HINT_HELP: If none words with the number of letter it is found you will not see any hints

PLAY.FREQUENT_TITLE: Letter and words more frequent in spanish:
PLAY.TUTORIAL_DESCRIPTION_FIRST: Click the symbol that needs to be replaced by a letter
PLAY.TUTORIAL_DESCRIPTION_SECOND: Now, select the letter that correctly complete the message

CONFIRM_MODAL.RESET_LETTERS_DESCRIPTION: Letter will be reset to the inital state. Are you sure to proceed?
